property.description: This gorgeous home is located along Lake Ouachita, offering a beautiful view of the lake right from your bedroom! This home features a cozy, rustic interior including three bedrooms, three bathrooms, and an adjoined kitchen, dining, and living room space. This wonderful home is complete with a lanai and a covered, wraparound porch. Additionally, this home includes a game room, stylish in-law apartment, and heavenly saltwater hot tub. Enjoy a luxurious, relaxing lifestyle along Lake Ouachita with this fabulous house.
property.typesOfRooms: Bedrooms, kitchen, living room/ dining room, Bathroom
